name: CINETIC PLUS, S.L.
about: At CINETIC PLUS, S.L., we are dedicated to transforming aviation enthusiasts into skilled and confident pilots. Located in a prime aviation hub, our flying school offers a comprehensive range of training programs, from private pilot licenses to advanced multi-engine certifications. Our fleet of well-maintained Cessna 172 aircraft, along with specialty planes, ensures optimal training conditions. With a strong emphasis on safety, cleanliness, and personalized instruction, we empower our students to navigate the skies with precision and confidence. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities make us the ideal choice for those seeking a career in aviation or simply the joy of flying. Join us at CINETIC PLUS, S.L., and embark on your aviation journey with excellence and passion.
services:
["Language proficiency (ICAO) in English
Airbus A310/A300-600 course (qualification)
ONLINE TRAINER OF TRAINERS COURSE
CRM INITIAL COURSE
UPDATE COURSE FOR TRI AND SFI INSTRUCTORS"]
